thread.title: Mercy B.
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by Mercy B.

author: Mercy B.
title: Mercy B.
text: I was helped by the service agent Ibrahim. He took his time and searched the best deal for my trip even though I had to change my mind couple times. He was very patient with me and kind. His service was beyond exceptional. His boss Ted was amazing and he was involved in my searching of flight and gave me a good offer. Overall, I am satisfied and recommend anyone to visit Asap Tickets. I have never received this kind of customer service anywhere like this before and I really appreciate this service. 03/01/17
